title: Biden Latino Support, 2020, Eco Recovery
itunes:title: Biden Latino Support, 2020, Eco Recovery
description:
Former Senior Advisor for the Bernie Sanders presidential campaign, Chuck Rocha discusses his book, "Tio Bernie: The Inside Story of How Bernie Sanders Brought Latinos Into The Political Revolution," Other guests include: Robert Shapiro, Chairman of Sonecon, Doug Heye, Senior Vice President of Media at Craft Media & Digital, and Laura Fink, Democratic Strategist and Founder & CEO of Rebelle Communications.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Former Senior Advisor for the Bernie Sanders presidential campaign, Chuck Rocha discusses his book, "Tio Bernie: The Inside Story of How Bernie Sanders Brought Latinos Into The Political Revolution," Other guests include: Robert Shapiro, Chairman of Sonecon, Doug Heye, Senior Vice President of Media at Craft Media & Digital, and Laura Fink, Democratic Strategist and Founder & CEO of Rebelle Communications.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
